SELECT so.id, so.code, so.price, so.amount, so.order_status AS orderStatus, so.create_date AS createDate, so.update_date AS updateDate, si.scenic_name AS scenicName, si.web_img AS webImg, si.area, si.scenic_price AS scenicPrice, si.point, si.hot, si.history, si.link, si.address, si.level, si.sold, ui.code AS userCode, ui.name AS userName, ui.email, ui.phone, ui.avatar FROM scenic_order so LEFT JOIN scenic_info si ON ( si.id = so.scenic_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = so.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND so.del_flag = 0
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicOrder.userName},'%')
AND si.scenic_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicOrder.scenicName},'%')
AND so.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicOrder.code},'%')
AND so.order_status = #{scenicOrder.orderStatus}
AND ui.id = #{scenicOrder.userId}
ORDER BY so.create_date DESC
select oi.* from scenic_order oi where 1 = 1 and DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
select oi.* from scenic_order oi where 1 = 1 and DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(COUNT(oi.id), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN 一起 oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(SUM(oi.after_order_price), 0) AS price FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN 一起 oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
